channel.title: A better client to download for Minecraft [Cracked]
channel.description:
Information on client I am posting It is a FREE client. It contains an updater which updates whenever Notch does. Link: http://soharuda.webuda.com/cracked-minecraft/ Description via website:
I have cracked the old minecraft launcher. I will never update this again if it is stopped, nor will I release the source. I did this for a friend who wanted to try minecraft before spending $20 USD on it. He later the same day did buy. After sharing this, I saw many people have bought minecraft after this for the sake of being able to change their skin, and login to online play. Just note, this is not stealing, as nobody looses anything. This is simply pirating a [b]copy[/b]

item.title: A better client to download for Minecraft [Cracked]
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:66, topic:377502”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=473399.msg4000845#msg4000845 date=1337973288]

bump, its a good client

Problem is it throws error messages all the time.
[/quote]Never had an iddue with it, except for that it sometimes takes 1-3 times to start.

Several people had issues with it. I never even got it to start up. Which caused me to look into hacking the JAR and making my own ‘crack’. Another reason myn is more widely used is the fact its JAR and not EXE, so it works on all platforms still lol. Oh well :D[/quote]
I have never had one issue with it, but that could just be me I don’t really know. Well sometimes when I’m running multiple things, it would crash like: LoL, Netbeans, xchat, chrome, etc but that is just me I guess

item.source: A better client to download for Minecraft [Cracked]

item.title: A better client to download for Minecraft [Cracked]
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“Joeburger, post:55, topic:377502”][quote author=crazyputje link=topic=473399.msg3634458#msg3634458 date=1308503282]
if you don’t believe it, scan it yourself!
[/quote][quote][/quote]

I too was weary of this launcher because it was a new post. So I carefully downloaded it and scanned before running. No warnings.

So then I ran it. It has a short new splash screen before the Launcher comes up. But I have run it many times and the annoying
“Could not find main class net.minecraft.launcherframe” error has not shown up yet.

So I extend my thanks to crazyputje. Thank you. That error was major annoying.

I also verify that this is not a virus. But if you don’t believe me that’s fine. Scan the exe for yourself. (before running)
Or you can make due with a launcher that gives an error 68% of the time. (if you use the launcher by AnjoCaido)[/quote]
Unfortunately people aren’t going to believe you based on the fact that you’re a first time poster.

And also,

whattehp406:

it’s easy to scan the clean one and send us the infected one…

Read full topic
item.source: A better client to download for Minecraft [Cracked]

item.title: A better client to download for Minecraft [Cracked]
item.dc:creator: @Joeburger Joeburger
item.description:
@Joeburger wrote:

crazyputje:

if you don’t believe it, scan it yourself!

I too was weary of this launcher because it was a new post. So I carefully downloaded it and scanned before running. No warnings.

So then I ran it. It has a short new splash screen before the Launcher comes up. But I have run it many times and the annoying
“Could not find main class net.minecraft.launcherframe” error has not shown up yet.

So I extend my thanks to crazyputje. Thank you. That error was major annoying.

I also verify that this is not a virus. But if you don’t believe me that’s fine. Scan the exe for yourself. (before running)
Or you can make due with a launcher that gives an error 68% of the time. (if you use the launcher by AnjoCaido)

Read full topic
